fields.label: Photo Album Order
fields.name: photo_album_order
fields.instructions: Enter the order of the album in relation to other albums.  An album with an order value of "1" is displayed before or above an album with an order value of "2".

fields.label: Photo Album Cover
fields.name: photo_album_cover
fields.instructions: Select an image to use for the photo album cover.  This image will only be included in the actual album if you add it to the Photo Album Images.

fields.label: Photo Album Images
fields.name: photo_album_images
fields.instructions: Select images to include in the album.  Drag and drop images to reorder.

fields.label: Place Code
fields.name: place_code
fields.instructions: Enter an airport, state, or country code.

fields.label: Feature on Home Page?
fields.name: smart_event_feature_home
fields.instructions: Select to feature this event on the home page.  To feature this event on the event landing page, check the "Feature?" box.

fields.label: Grid buttons under the main slider
fields.name: grid_buttons_under_main_slider

sub_fields.label: Button text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.placeholder: Text that shows on the button here..

fields.label: Video Order
fields.name: video_order
fields.instructions: Select the order in which the video should appear in relation to other videos within the selected video collection(s).  A video with an order of "1" will appear before/above a  video with an order of "2".

fields.label: Hero Area: Text and Button color
fields.name: hero_area_text_color

fields.label: Hero Area: Webinar information
fields.name: hero_area_webinar_dropdown_1
fields.instructions: Choose Webinar page from where to pull the Title and the Icon image.

fields.label: Hero Area: Icon Image
fields.name: hero_area_icon_image
fields.instructions: Add an icon image that will be visible in the hero area in the webinar page if this post is selected.

sub_fields.label: Sponsor URL
sub_fields.name: sponsor_url
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the link that the logo will link to.

fields.label: Full width
fields.name: full_width
fields.instructions: Check this for full-width hero background

fields.label: Feature on Home Page?
fields.name: venue_feature_home
fields.instructions: Select to feature this venue on the home page. To feature this venue on the venue landing page, check the "Feature?" box.

fields.label: Guest Author
fields.name: guest_author
fields.placeholder: Only use this if the post author does not have a WordPress user profile.

title: Homepage Top Stories Slider Post Position
